message.content:
We only record depreciation when a “Depreciation” type transaction is posted. In these transactions we have no prior accumulated depreciation at the beginning (the “Initial” value is 0); then the first (and only) depreciation entry is:

• ID: Depreciation20240101001 Type: Depreciation Amount: 45751.04

Thus the accumulated depreciation “rolls‐up” to zero at first and then becomes 45751.04 after this depreciation transaction.

Hence, the answer is:

{"solution": {'Accumulated Depreciation Initial Value': '0.00', 'Accumulated Depreciation End Value': '45751.04'}}
